text: The Little Engine That Could is an illustrated children's book that was first published in 1930 by Platt & Munk. The Little Engine That Could may also refer to: * The Little Engine That Could (1991 film) * The Little Engine That Could (2011 film) * "The Little Engine That Could", a song by Burl Ives from Burl Ives Sings Little White Duck and Other Children's Favorites
title: The Little Engine That Could (disambiguation)
